subject: Horse Racing
Deaths (Obituaries)
Veterinary Medicine
Frauds and Swindling
lead_paragraph: Dr. Gerard cared for champions like Kelso and Secretariat but imported a horse that ran as a ringer who won at odds of 57 to 1.
snippet: Dr. Gerard cared for champions like Kelso and Secretariat but imported a horse that ran as a ringer who won at odds of 57 to 1.
